first_translate: the knights from house ernest have arrived.
I wonder what’s going on...
it looks like they’re in quite a hurry.
haha.

hangle: 저는 무슨 일인지 알 것도 같습니다.
first_translate: but I think I know why that is.

hangle: 영애에게 지지 않기 위해 큰 한 방이라도 노리는 거겠지요.
first_translate: marquess clovis must’ve decided to go all out so he doesn’t lose against lady fiona.
lord clovis.

hangle: 영애께서도 자리를 이동해서 마저 사냥을 하실 건가요?
first_translate: will you also move somewhere else to continue hunting?
no.
I’m taking a break because my stamina has reached its limit.
is that right...?

hangle: 피오나 영애는 헤일론에서 오랫동안 마물을 상대했죠.
first_translate: lady fiona fought monsters for a long time while she was at hylon.

hangle: 개인적으로 마물에 관해 영애의 의견을 듣고 싶습니다만.
first_translate: if possible, could you tell me your thoughts about these creatures?

hangle: 제가 답변해 드릴 수 있는 거라면요.
first_translate: of course, if there's anything I can answer.

hangle: 영애는 혹시 ‘어둠’에 대해 들어본 적 있습니까?
first_translate: do you happen to know something called “the darkness”?
that question wasn’t unexpected.

hangle: 아렌트가 말한 ‘어둠’은, 통상적인 의미로 쓰이는 단어가 아니다.
first_translate: when arendt says "darkness," he isn't using the term as we normally do.
yes, I've heard of it before.

hangle: 작중 피오나가 최종 보스가 된 가장 큰 이유가 이 ‘어둠’을 다루려고 하다가 실패한 거니까.
first_translate: this "darkness" is actually one reason how fiona became the final boss in the story.
darkness does not take any particular form.

hangle: 보통 전조도 없이 등장하기에 피할 방법도 없다.
first_translate: and since it appears without warning, there’s no way to avoid it either.

hangle: 다만 그것이 나타나면 땅은 메말랐고, 주변 마물은 흉포해졌다.
first_translate: all we know is that when it shows up, the ground becomes dry and the surrounding demons become more vicious.

hangle: 어둠이란 현상이 나타난 지역의 마물은 더욱 광폭하고 강해진다고 하죠.
first_translate: they say that once this phenomenon occurs, the monsters in those areas grow stronger and even crazier than usual.
yes, that’s correct.

hangle: ‘어둠’이란 단어자체는 아카데미 학자들이 처음 그 현상을 파악했을 때 명명됐지만…
first_translate: scholars named this phenomenon “darkness,” but...

hangle: 학자들도 어둠에 대한 건 어느 것 하나 확언을 못하죠.
first_translate: even scholars cannot confirm much about it.
that’s because nobody who witnessed the darkness directly...
...has survived.
you’re absolutely right.
so you already knew about this.

hangle: 보통 어둠과 닿은 사람은 모두가 죽었다.
first_translate: normally, anyone who comes into contact with the darkness dies.

hangle: 그 현상을 직접 목격한 자가 한 명도 없으니, 자연히 정보의 양 자체가 매우 적다.
first_translate: as such, very little information exists regarding this matter.
however, only one person...
...survived after coming across the darkness.

hangle: 바로 눈 앞에 있는 아렌트 클로비스.
first_translate: and that would be none other than arendt clovis himself.

hangle: 어릴 적, 그는 어둠이 나타난 순간을 목격하고도 살아남았다.
first_translate: in his childhood, he managed to survive witnessing the moment the darkness appeared.
although he suffered severe side effects afterward,

hangle: 어둠에 의한 후유증을 최대한 늦춰 주는
first_translate: now he always carries around magic stones...

hangle: 가공한 마석을 늘 지니고 다니게 되었지만.
first_translate: ...that were processed to delay the side effects caused by the darkness.

hangle: 그렇게 유예 시간을 얻은 그는 자신의 몸을 침식하는 후유증과,
first_translate: with some extra time gained thanks to them, he’s trying to find ways to eliminate both the aftermath affecting his body...

hangle: 그 ‘어둠’이란 존재를 없앨 방법을 찾고 있다.
first_translate: ...and the existence known as “darkness.”

hangle: …이건 아렌트가 유니스를 좋아하게 되면서 털어 놓는 이야기니
first_translate: unfortunately, I won’t be able to act like I know this part of the story yet...
arendt will reveal this later on when he starts liking eunis.
at hylon, people are concerned about the darkness too.

hangle: 다만 어둠이 출현한 적은 없어 정보가 무척 적답니다.
first_translate: but since it hasn’t shown itself over here, we don’t have much information about it.
I see.
right now, arendt has come up with a hypothesis.
these aren’t just ordinary gems.
after all, they’re magic stones.

hangle: 마석은 그 자체로 어둠의 후유증을 지체시킨다.
first_translate: on their own, magic stones slow down the side effects of the darkness.
and magic stones are affected by mana.
then perhaps a powerful magician...

hangle: 마력을 사용해 ‘어둠’을 조종할 수 있지 않을까.
first_translate: ...can use their powers to control the darkness.

hangle: 그리고 그 가설을 시험할 조건에 부합하는 마법사가 바로…
first_translate: and the magician who meets the conditions needed to test this theory happens to be...
fiona herself.

hangle: 물론 지금의 나로서는 아렌트를 도울 마음이 별로 없지만.
first_translate: of course, I'm not really interested in helping him right now.
hey.

hangle: 여기서 단 둘이 뭐 하는 거지?
first_translate: what are you two doing alone together?
your highness.
we were resting for a bit.
I hear you made a bet with duke ernest--
how laid-back of you, lady fiona.

hangle: 아, 왜 농땡이 치냐고 묻고 있는 거지?
first_translate: wait, is he asking us why we’re slacking off?

hangle: 전하께서도 이번 대회가 꽤나 지루하셨나 보네요.
first_translate: it seems like your highness finds today’s competition rather dull.

hangle: 마물을 담는 수레가 아직 넉넉해 보입니다.
first_translate: there still seem to be plenty of wagons left to fill.
to be honest, yes. it’s boring.

hangle: 그러니 나도 둘의 휴식에 껴 주면 좋겠군.
first_translate: why don’t I join you two then?
what are you doing?!
my goodness, it’d be our honor to rest alongside your highness.
I suppose I’ll end my break early.
this feels awkward.
excuse me, please.
I wish you both good luck--
a horn during the tournament...

hangle: 이건 사냥 대회를 끝낸다는 소리가 아닌가요?
first_translate: doesn’t this mean the hunt is ending?
not yet. we still have a lot of work ahead of us.
but if they sounded the horns already,
that means something went wrong.
and probably not in a good way!
take a look, fiona.
those are monsters caught by another team.
they appear to be common low-level monsters,

hangle: 보시다시피 이빨이나 발톱도 원래보다 훨씬 크고 단단하지.
first_translate: but as you can see, their teeth and claws are larger and harder than normal ones.
their leg muscles and skin are tougher too.
usually, fire works well against these types of monsters,

hangle: 이 정도로 겉이 단단하면 웬만한 불로는 소용도 없겠죠.
first_translate: but given how hard their outer shells are, regular flames wouldn’t help much.

hangle: 솔직히 이렇게 변형될 이유는 하나밖에 없다.
first_translate: honestly speaking, there’s only one explanation behind this transformation.

hangle: 너도 대충 짐작 하고 있는 것 같은데.
first_translate: I believe you might already suspect what it is.
the appearance...
...of the darkness.
we have wounded men!
call the physician immediately!
I saw...
...dry black land where everything had died.

hangle: 통제선 너머에서 어둠으로 변형된 몹시 강한 마물들을 만났어.
first_translate: outside the boundary line, we encountered extremely strong monsters altered by the darkness.

hangle: 잠깐 싸운 것 만으로도 기사들이 수없이 목숨을 빼앗겼지…
first_translate: countless lives were lost despite fighting briefly...
apparently, the darkness came and disappeared again.

hangle: 어둠이 나타나는 순간을 맞닥뜨렸다면, 모조리 죽었을 거다.
first_translate: if they faced the exact moment it showed up, everyone would’ve been killed instantly.
evacuate the tents quickly!

hangle: 사냥터에 남아 있는 자가 없는지도 빠르게 확인하도록!
first_translate: make haste checking whether or not anybody remains inside the hunting grounds!
reporting back!

hangle: 피 냄새를 따라 남쪽 입구에 마물이 나타났습니다!
first_translate: monsters have appeared near the southern entrance following the scent of blood!

hangle: 비전투 인원은 당장 뒤로 빠지고, 싸울 수 있는 자는 무기를 들어라!
first_translate: non-combatants retreat immediately, and combatants prepare yourselves!
yes, sir!!!
fiona, you should--
I'll fight!

hangle: …이미 좀 지쳤으니 전투 보조로 빠지라고 말 하려 했다만.
first_translate: I wanted to suggest that she stay away from battle support since she’s exhausted already.
that'd be a waste of manpower!
let’s first search for someone who needs urgent assistance.
once we finish, we’ll head to the front lines.
I’ll return after tending to the patients!
but lady eunis--!
eunis?
there are people poisoned badly enough to require immediate treatment.
I’ll treat them and leave with them.

hangle: 치유의 힘을 가진 사람으로써 환자를 두고 갈 수는 없어요.
first_translate: as somebody gifted with healing abilities, I couldn’t possibly abandon these patients.
th-then we shall excuse ourselves...
e-eunis?!!
I’ll cure your poison right away...!
